comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Looks more like sauntering to meet the enemy.

comment.author: 74132238@N00
comment._content:
Nice composition.
I wonder how many of these men did not survive the next two years.

comment.author: 13070533@N07
comment._content: These are Belgian infantry from August 1914; they're probably retreating in the face of overwhelming German opposition rather than advancing.

comment.author: 13070533@N07
comment._content: According to the caption to a reproduction of the same photograph in "L'armée française de l'été 1914" it shows Belgian infantry retreating from Saint-Trond towards Tirlemont in August 1914.
